title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Final Draymond Verdict, 'Sharp or Square' Week 6 NFL Picks
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Final Draymond Verdict, 'Sharp or Square' Week 6 NFL Picks
description:
Colin gives his final verdict about Draymond Green blasting Jordan Poole with a viral haymaker, and if it’s cause for outrage or more common than the public realizes (3:00).

Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 6 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Ravens/Giants (13:00), Bengals/Saints (15:00), Cowboys/Eagles (17:00), Bills/Chiefs (20:00), Niners/Falcons (21:00), Cardinals/Seahawks (23:00), Broncos/Chargers (28:00), Vikings/Dolphins (30:00), Jets/Packers (31:00).

Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd #volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
